Title: Somewhere West
Writer: David Marek (story & script), David Marek, Judson Webb, Barrett Ogden, Adam Benn
Actors: Barrett Ogden, Judson Webb, Jennifer Summers, Hallie Schwartz
Plot: "Somewhere West" is a visually breathtaking road-film that explores the human spirit with emotional breadth and quiet subtlety. After battling with a terminal illness, Ian decides to forgo ...
